g.text: Propagation Delay | 2-10 ns | 10-50 ns | 0.5-2 ns | 1-5 ns
Power Dissipation | 10-50 mW | 0.01-1 mW | 50-200 mW | 1-20 mW
Applications | General | Low Power | High Speed | Mixed Signal
Figure of Merit | 20-500 pJ | 0.1-50 pJ | 25-400 pJ | 5-100 pJ
Standard logic, moderate speed, compatibility needed
Low power, battery operation, wide voltage range
Maximum speed, high-frequency applications, power not critical
Balance of speed and power, mixed-signal designs
CMOS dominates due to power efficiency and scalability
Speed vs Power vs Cost trade-offs determine optimal choice
Lower voltage, higher integration, specialized variants
